blog.name: ainstgirl
blog.title: AinstGirl
blog.description: MASTERLIST http://ainstgirl.tumblr.com/post/173413774649/masterlist

summary: THE WAY HE LOOKS AT YOU
title: THE WAY HE LOOKS AT YOU
body:
The way he looks at you when he sees you talking with another man, it breaks your heart, but it just couldn’t be. He bites his lower lip looking away. You know that right now he’s clenching his fist until his nails dig, you would like to go and hold his hand, tell him that everything will be okay, but you cant, you shouldn’t do it. You had tried, and that almost cost him his life. You were distracting him, he was worried about you instead of focusing on the mission, and that almost kill him, you couldn’t live with that, you love him too much to allow it so you ended up with the relationship. If you have to break his heart to save him, it’s something you were willing to do. He was the love of your life but… it wasn’t meant to be.


MASTERLIST

blog.name: weheartchrisevans
blog.title: chris evans fans
blog.description:
Welcome to the 
WEHEARTCHRISEVANS, a blog dedicated to the actor Chris Evans
Evans is known best for his superheroroles as the marvel characters  Steve Rogers in Captain America and Johnny Storm/Human Torch. 
 We track #evansedit and #weheartchrisevans

summary: scottevansgram: Fun night at the CAA party with my brother and @ladybidwell . I’m gonna need that filter the Polaroid...
caption: scottevansgram: Fun night at the CAA party with my brother and @ladybidwell . I’m gonna need that filter the Polaroid photographer used to be used on ALL my pictures from now on. Thank you @ted_baker for the amazing jacket and pants!! 😍😍
